data.title: Approach
data.meta_description: Hg focuses on building transatlantic champions that provide critical services for many thousands of businesses globally.
data.text:
Collectively the Hg portfolio represents one of the largest and fastest growing transatlantic software businesses.

We back the best businesses: sharing similar characteristics, but differ in size and maturity. All benefit from being part of a larger community, whilst retaining their own identity

This creates a natural environment for knowledge sharing and unlocks a network effect to our businesses with satellite minds that sit around us.

We are investing in the future, backing businesses that are redefining how industries work.

Driving decades-long trends means maintaining partnerships that span professional lifetimes.

We have grown businesses from rising stars to international champions worth over $10 billion.

This doesnâ€™t happen overnight but together we can build a legacy.
